page.title: 11Our playground games
page.content: We live in Keyham. We go to St. Luke's School, Thurnby. At school we play games like{Free Pod}and{British {Bulldog.}Free Pod is where one person is{on.}They close their eyes and count to 100 while the other people playing go and hide. The person who is on looks for the people hiding. When he or she has found them they have to run back to base before the person who is on{pods}the base (touches it and declares "pod ...." whatever their name is). British Bulldog is where a row of children line up and someone is on in front of them. He or she calls out a name and that person has to run to the other side and avoid being caught. If they are caught they are on as well!
